Description: Black steatite cippus; standards on either side of Harpocrates; eight registers of Gods and text in the field; other surfaces covered with rows of Hieroglyphic text; two fragments re-joined.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Magic in Ancient Egypt (London 1994), fig.7. H. Sternberg-El Hotabi, Untersuchungen zur Überlieferungsgeschichte der Horusstelen, ÄA 62, p. 55. D. Antoine and M. Vandenbeusch, Egyptian mummies. Exploring ancient lives, Sydney 2016, p. 107. Quack, J.F. 2022. Altägyptische Amulette und ihre Handhabung. Orientalische Religionen in der Antike 31. Tübingen, pp. 228, 241.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 10)
